nodes.text: Om Aynat was a former chef who owned and operated a food stand in Mos Entha during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Om Aynat employed a spacer carry out several tasks for him. Om Aynat awarded the spacer with Corellian ale, a data disk, a recorded image, and a small belt after the spacer served him dutifully.

Not much is known about Om Aynat. He used to be a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies before being removed from the game by the developers. Players used to be able to find him in Mos Entha, and carry out four tasks for him. After completing these tasks, players would be awarded various items, such as Corellian ale or a small belt.

He is listed as a Tatooinian townsperon in the Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided: Prima's Official Strategy Guide. Other sources, including The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, lists Om Aynat as a Human male ex-chef.
